00037 #include "egs_parallel_beam.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 
00040 EGS_ParallelBeam::EGS_ParallelBeam(EGS_Input *input,
00041                                    EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_BaseSimpleSource(input,f), shape(0), uo(0,0,1) {
00042     vector<EGS_Float> dir;
00043     if (!input->getInput("direction",dir)) {
00044         if (dir.size() != 3) egsWarning("EGS_ParallelBeam: you must input"
00045                                             " 3 numbers in the 'direction' input\n"
00046                                             "  but I got %d => ignoring the input\n",dir.size());
00047         else {
00048             uo.x = dir[0];
00049             uo.y = dir[1];
00050             uo.z = dir[2];
00051             EGS_Float norm = uo.length();
00052             if (norm < 1e-6) {
00053                 egsWarning("EGS_ParallelBeam: the length of the direction"
00054                            " vector can not be zero => ignoring your input\n");
00055                 uo.x = 0;
00056                 uo.y = 0;
00057                 uo.z = 1;
00058             }
00059             else {
00060                 uo *= (1./norm);
00061             }
00062         }
00063     }
00064     EGS_Input *ishape = input->takeInputItem("shape");
00065     if (ishape) {
00066         //egsWarning("EGS_ParallelBeam: trying to construct the shape\n");
00067         shape = EGS_BaseShape::createShape(ishape);
00068         delete ishape;
00069     }
00070     if (!shape) {
00071         string sname;
00072         int err = input->getInput("shape name",sname);
00073         if (err)
00074             egsWarning("EGS_ParallelBeam: missing/wrong inline shape "
00075                        "definition and missing wrong 'shape name' input\n");
00076         else {
00077             shape = EGS_BaseShape::getShape(sname);
00078             if (!shape) egsWarning("EGS_ParallelBeam: a shape named %s"
00079                                        " does not exist\n");
00080         }
00081     }
00082     setUp();
00083 }
00084 
00085 void EGS_ParallelBeam::setUp() {
00086     otype = "EGS_ParallelBeam";
00087     if (!isValid()) {
00088         description = "Invalid parallel beam";
00089     }
00090     else {
00091         description = "Parallel beam from a shape of type ";
00092         description += shape->getObjectType();
00093         description += " with ";
00094         description += s->getType();
00095         if (q == -1) {
00096             description += ", electrons";
00097         }
00098         else if (q == 0) {
00099             description += ", photons";
00100         }
00101         else if (q == 1) {
00102             description += ", positrons";
00103         }
00104         else {
00105             description += ", unknown particle type";
00106         }
00107     }
00108 }

00110 extern "C" {
00111 
00112     EGS_PARALLEL_BEAM_EXPORT EGS_BaseSource *createSource(EGS_Input *input,
00113             EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00114         return createSourceTemplate<EGS_ParallelBeam>(input,f,"parallel beam");
00115     }
